name: Splashy Sharky - Don’t get mines in endless road!
name_original: Splashy Sharky - Don’t get mines in endless road!
description:
Swim with the devouring sharky, avoid the mines, and eat as much fish as you can!

Features:
- Challenging and fun gameplay!
- Cool Graphics!
- Great Music and sounds!
- Very addicting!

More info at www.boviosoft.com
